TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit CameraCharacteristics extends Android.Hardware.Camera2.CameraMetadata
Public NotInheritable Class CameraCharacteristics Inherits CameraMetadata

Docs.summary: The properties describing a CameraDevice CameraDevice.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property AutomotiveLensFacing As CameraCharacteristics.Key

Docs.summary: To be added.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property AutomotiveLocation As CameraCharacteristics.Key

Docs.summary: To be added.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property AvailableCaptureRequestKeys As IList(Of CaptureRequest.Key)

Docs.summary: Returns the list of keys supported by this CameraDevice for querying with a CaptureRequest.
Docs.value: List of keys supported by this CameraDevice for CaptureRequests.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property AvailableCaptureResultKeys As IList(Of CaptureResult.Key)

Docs.summary: Returns the list of keys supported by this CameraDevice for querying with a CaptureResult.
Docs.value: List of keys supported by this CameraDevice for CaptureResults.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property AvailablePhysicalCameraRequestKeys As IList(Of CaptureRequest.Key)

Docs.summary: Returns a subset of #getAvailableCaptureRequestKeys keys that can be overridden for physical devices backing a logical multi-camera.
Docs.value: List of keys that can be overridden in individual physical device requests. In case the camera device doesn't support such keys the list can be null.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property AvailableSessionKeys As IList(Of CaptureRequest.Key)

Docs.summary: Returns a subset of #getAvailableCaptureRequestKeys keys that the camera device can pass as part of the capture session initialization.
Docs.value: List of keys that can be passed during capture session initialization. In case the camera device doesn't support such keys the list can be null.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property ColorCorrectionAvailableAberrationModes As CameraCharacteristics.Key

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class Android.Hardware.Camera2.Params.RecommendedStreamConfigurationMap GetRecommendedStreamConfigurationMap(valuetype Android.Hardware.Camera2.Params.UsecaseMode usecase) cil managed
Public Function GetRecommendedStreamConfigurationMap (usecase As UsecaseMode) As RecommendedStreamConfigurationMap

Docs.summary: Retrieve camera device recommended stream configuration map RecommendedStreamConfigurationMap for a given use case.
Docs.returns: Valid RecommendedStreamConfigurationMap or null in case the camera device doesn't have any recommendation for this use case or the recommended configurations are invalid.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property KeysNeedingPermission As IList(Of CameraCharacteristics.Key)

Docs.summary: Returns a subset of the list returned by #getKeys with all keys that require camera clients to obtain the android.Manifest.permission#CAMERA permission.
Docs.value: List of camera characteristic keys that require the android.Manifest.permission#CAMERA permission. The list can be empty in case there are no currently present keys that need additional permission.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property SensorCalibrationTransform1 As CameraCharacteristics.Key

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property SensorCalibrationTransform2 As CameraCharacteristics.Key

Docs.summary: A per-device calibration transform matrix that maps from the reference sensor colorspace to the actual device sensor colorspace (this is the colorspace of the raw buffer data).

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property SensorColorTransform1 As CameraCharacteristics.Key

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property SensorColorTransform2 As CameraCharacteristics.Key

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property SensorForwardMatrix1 As CameraCharacteristics.Key

Docs.summary: A matrix that transforms white balanced camera colors from the reference sensor colorspace to the CIE XYZ colorspace with a D50 whitepoint.
